in.srain.cube.image

Class ImageDiskCacheProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.srain.cube.cache.DiskCacheProvider
      • in.srain.cube.image.ImageDiskCacheProvider

  • public class ImageDiskCacheProvider
extends DiskCacheProvider
    This class handles disk and memory caching of bitmaps.

    Most of the code is taken from the Android best practice of displaying Bitmaps Displaying Bitmaps Efficiently.
